title: Facts Concerning The Late Arthur Jermyn and his Family
description: In the most common Lovecraft's way of retelling something, this story starts from the end, from Arthur Jermyn's suicide, emphasises the importance of something he found out, then goes back a couple of generations to tell the story of his family. The past explains his peculiar appearance and the way and reason he died.
author: H.P. Lovecraft
